about_the_game:
Legends Resurrected Online It is a Free MMORPG with a classic 2D style. Explore and discover the wide variety of weapons and items you can obtain. Find a group and take down the wild beasts, create equipment to aid your progress.

One of the most interesting features is that you can equip wings, runes, Mounts and other special items. which can be upgraded over dozens of levels, with each level improving both your character's appearance and stats.

- You will be able to explore the mapping and talk to other players.
- Play the dungeons and collect Items to access the Creation of equipment and medicines
- Rune system
- Mining system
- Equipment system
- Skin System
- Wing System
- Mounting system

name: Legends Resurrected Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2Duo+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: .Net Framework 7.0

short_description: Legends Resurrected Online It is a Free MMORPG with a classic 2D style. Explore and discover the wide variety of weapons and items you can obtain. Find a group and take down the wild beasts, create equipment to aid your progress.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
